置きざり: (おきざり) - (usu. as 置き去りにする) desertion; leaving behind; leaving in the lurch
置きっぱ: (おきっぱ) - leaving something where it is; abandoning something
置きっぱなし: (おきっぱなし) - leaving something where it is; abandoning something
置きっ放し: (おきっぱなし) - leaving something where it is; abandoning something
置きどころ: (おきどころ) - place to put things/shed/storage space; (usu. as 身の置き所)  place to put oneself
置きなさい: (おきなさい) - put (imperative form)/place; leave (imperative form); do (in preparation) (imperative form, after -te form of verb)
置きに: (おきに) - repeated at intervals; every other (day, week, month, ...)
置きみやげ: (おきみやげ) - parting gift; remembrance; aftereffect
置き傘: (おきがさ) - spare umbrella kept (at work) in the event of a sudden shower
置き勉: (おきべん) - leaving all your textbooks, etc., at school
置き去り: (おきざり) - (usu. as 置き去りにする) desertion; leaving behind; leaving in the lurch
置き土: (おきつち) - earth taken from elsewhere and placed atop
置き土産: (おきみやげ) - parting gift; remembrance; aftereffect
置き字: (おきじ) - kanji left unpronounced when reading Chinese
置き床: (おきどこ) - portable dais used to create a removable tokonoma
置き引き: (おきびき) - walking away with another's bag; luggage theft; luggage thief
置き忘れる: (おきわすれる) - to leave behind; to misplace; to forget
置き所: (おきどころ) - place to put things/shed/storage space; (usu. as 身の置き所)  place to put oneself
置き手紙: (おきてがみ) - letter left behind by someone who has departed; farewell letter
置き換え: (おきかえ) - replacement; substitute; displacement; transposition; reset
置き換える: (おきかえる) - to replace; to move; to change the position of
置き換わる: (おきかわる) - to be rearranged or transposed
置き時計: (おきどけい) - clock to be placed on tables, bookshelves, etc. (as opposed to a watch)
置き替え: (おきかえ) - replacement; substitute; displacement; transposition; reset
置き替える: (おきかえる) - to replace; to move; to change the position of
置き棚: (おきだな) - shelf that can be moved around; whatnot
置き物: (おきもの) - ornament; figurehead; object placed in tokonoma
置き碁: (おきご) - game of go played with a handicap
置き違える: (おきちがえる) - to put something in the wrong place; to misplace
置く: (おく) - to put/to place; to leave (behind); to establish (an organization, a facility, a position, etc.)/to set up; to appoint (someone to a certain position)/to hire/to employ; to place (one's trust, one's faith, etc)/to bear (in mind etc); to put down a tool (e.g. a pen) hence stopping what one is doing with that tool; to take in (boarders, etc.)/to provide lodging in one's house; to separate spatially or temporally; (after the -te form of a verb) to do something in advance; (after the -te form of a verb) to leave something in a certain state/to keep something in a certain state
置去り: (おきざり) - (usu. as 置き去りにする) desertion; leaving behind; leaving in the lurch
置床: (おきどこ) - portable dais used to create a removable tokonoma
置引き: (おきびき) - walking away with another's bag; luggage theft; luggage thief
置忘れる: (おきわすれる) - to leave behind; to misplace; to forget

置手紙: (おきてがみ) - letter left behind by someone who has departed; farewell letter
置換え: (おきかえ) - replacement; substitute; displacement; transposition; reset
置換キャラクタ: (ちかんキャラクタ) - substitute character; SUB
置換可能引数データ: (ちかんかのうひきすうデータ) - replaceable parameter data
置換可能文字データ: (ちかんかのうもじデータ) - replaceable character data
置数消去機能: (ちすうしょうきょきのう) - clear entry function
置時計: (おきどけい) - clock to be placed on tables, bookshelves, etc. (as opposed to a watch)
置替え: (おきかえ) - replacement; substitute; displacement; transposition; reset
置棚: (おきだな) - shelf that can be moved around; whatnot
置物: (おきもの) - ornament; figurehead; object placed in tokonoma
置碁: (おきご) - game of go played with a handicap
罰が当たる: (ばちがあたる) - to incur divine punishment/to pay for one's sins; You'll pay for that!/What goes around, comes around
罰する: (ばっする) - to punish; to penalize; to penalise
罰せられる: (ばっせられる) - (irregular passive form of 罰する) to be subject to punishment; be punished
罰を与える: (ばつをあたえる) - to punish (e.g. a child, etc.)
罰を受ける: (ばつをうける) - to receive punishment; to be punished; to pay a penalty
罰ゲーム: (ばつゲーム) - game played as a form of punishment by the loser of a contest
罰一: (バツイチ) - (joc)  being once divorced; one-time divorcee; one x mark, i.e. one name struck from the koseki
罰則: (bassoku) - punição, penalidade; regulamentos penais, código penal
罰室: (ばっしつ) - punishment room; penal cell
罰杯: (ばっぱい) - alcohol which must be drunk as a penalty
罰点: (バッテン) - cross mark; demerit mark; an X
署名式: (しょめいしき) - signing ceremony (for a law, treaty, etc.)
署名捺印: (しょめいなついん) - sign and seal
署名運動: (しょめいうんどう) - signature-collecting campaign
署員: (しょいん) - staff member; station employee; official
署長: (しょちょう) - chief (of police); head (of office)
罵る: (ののしる) - to abuse (verbally); to curse at; to shout abuse at; to speak ill of
罵倒: (batou) - (verbal) abuso, denúncia, difamação, vilipêndio, crítica severa
罵声: (basei) - gritos de abuso, vaias, vaias de desaprovação
罵詈讒謗: (ばりざんぼう) - (yoji) reviling; vilification; abusive language; lashing somebody using abusive language; speaking abusively of somebody
罵詈雑言: (ばりぞうごん) - (yoji) vilification; vituperation; abusive language
罷む: (やむ) - to cease; to stop; to be over
罷めさせる: (やめさせる) - to fire (from job); to discharge
罷める: (やめる) - to resign; to retire; to quit; to leave (one's job, etc.)
